extension.summary: For PC with a Default Browser. Streams are now playable in KODI (XBMC). Thanks to konbon for the new artwork.
extension.description: Used to browse the site of Live Streams and allow you to launch your OS's default browser via XBMC's context menu(s) so to visit the channel's page, embed video, or embed chat. Streams are now playable in KODI (XBMC).
